comment: Good, respects students, 3 tests, 3 programming assignments (medium difficulty) and 1 summary of a research paper.

Highly recommend for Internet Programming as that was the course I have taken with him. He provides plenty of lecture videos that correlate with the exercises and homework he gives out. If you are willing to spend time watching lectures, then this is the guy. Grading is straightforward. His lectures can seem a bit dull, but that isn't much problem.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria--Lecture heavy
